analysis.description:
ProofToken.balances (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#131-133) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#221-246)
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#311-342)
	- mint (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#342-361)
	- importPresaleBalances (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#372-387)
ProofToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#457-464) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol:
	Contract ProofToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#176-177)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in ProofToken.approve (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#273-297):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ControllerInterface(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#287-290)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#290-291)

ProofToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#430) shadows:
	- ProofToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#467-472)

ProofToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/22/0xc6390f8bf2fb04fb0f91dc9be93046a1db8fdac3.sol#457-464)
